Get in touch

Software Engineer currently based in San Diego, California.

Hello! My name is Ryan and I’m an architect turned software engineer. I love building fast, light-weight applications and PWA’s. JavaScript is my "native" programming language. I primarily use it in the frontend with React and in the backend with Node.

What I've been working on

Application

GoSurf.io

Built with JavaScript and runs as a Single Page Web Application (SPA). The goal of GoSurf is to simplify checking the conditions of your local surf spot by providing stripped down, live weather forecasts from around the world.

HTML

JavaScript

Node

Express

Application

CodeSnap

A web application that allows users to add snippets of code inside a text field right on the webpage, give it some styling and snap a screenshot for sharing to social media platforms.
